section.title: XDR Description of NFSv4.2
section.t: This document contains the XDR () description of NFSv4.2 protocol (). In order to facilitate implementations that support all of NFSv4.0, NFSv4.1, and NFSv4.2, the description includes operations, and other features of NFSv4.0 and NFSv4.1 that do not apply to NFSv4.2.
